title: Can we pay fees to Transfer money from one country? assimalhakeem JAL
transcript: NAS from aan nas when uh I want to um send a money to a foreign cart I have to pay commission is it Halal when you want to send money to where uh to a foreign card what is that uh not my country's car time yeah you want to transfer money from country to a country yes no problem the the money you give to the bank for this money transfer is their fee and this is totally permissible inshallah
